name: AzureResourceGroupDeployment
description: Provision and Deploy an Azure Resource Group
helpMarkDown: Provision and Deploy an Azure Resource Group
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure subscription under which the Resource Group is deployed.

inputs.name: csmFile
inputs.label: Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to the Azure Resource Manager template. For more information on templates:http://aka.ms/azuretemplates.

inputs.name: csmParametersFile
inputs.label: Template Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path for the parameters file corresponding to the Azure Resource Manager Template.

inputs.name: overrideParameters
inputs.label: Override Template Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the template parameters to be overridden in the format
-parameterName $(variableName) or
-parameterName parameterValue

inputs.name: dscDeployment
inputs.label: Generate SAS token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Generates SAS token for the Azure blob that is used in the template. Useful if the SAS token expires quickly.

inputs.name: moduleUrlParameterName
inputs.label: Azure Blob Parameter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the parameter corresponding to the Azure blob.

inputs.name: sasTokenParameterName
inputs.label: SAS Token Parameter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the SAS token parameter.

inputs.name: vmCreds
inputs.label: Virtual Machine Credentials (Mandatory for Deployment)
inputs.helpMarkDown: These VM resource's credentials are used by the other deployment and test tasks. The Username and Password should be same as specified in the above template and currently all the Virtual Machines should have the same credentials.

inputs.name: skipCACheck
inputs.label: SkipCACheck
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether the client validates that the server certificate is signed by a trusted certificate authority (CA) when connecting over Hypertext Transfer Protocol over Secure Socket Layer (HTTPS).
